hero.title: Passion For <span class='color-primary'>Coding<span>
hero.description: We are a community of software developers in Discord

about: We are actively growing community of software developers. Passion for coding was created for gathering different people to make good atmosphere of education process. Our community is based in Discord. This platform is a good place to build good structure for people communications.

benefits.description2: Channels to learn, talk and have fun
benefits.description4: Amount of knowledge you can earn

roles.title: Our roles
roles.description: Community roles do not measure knowledge. They show the activity of the participant.
